briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Long-term Use of Valsartan in Children 6 Months to 5 Years Old With Hypertension
officialTitle: An Open Label Extension Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of 18 Weeks of Valsartan Treatment in Children 6 Months-5 Years Old With Hypertension
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of long-term use (up to 18 weeks) of valsartan in children 6 months to 5 years old with hypertension.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Mean Sitting Systolic Blood Pressure (MSSBP)
